C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: config
command: touch /etc/ssh/ssh_host__key.pub && ltsp initrd && ltsp grub -h -H && while inotifywait -e delete_self -q /etc/ltsp/..data; do ltsp initrd && ltsp grub -h -H; done

containers.name: http
command: ln -sf /shared/ltsp/ltsp.img /srv/tftp/ltsp/ltsp.img && ln -sf /shared/ltsp/grub /srv/tftp/ltsp/grub && ln -sf /proc/self/fd/2 /var/log/nginx/error.log && ln -sf /proc/self/fd/2 /var/log/nginx/access.log && exec nginx -g "daemon off;"

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
Prevent containers from allowing command execution
